name: Hollow Body Hold
setup: Lie on back with arms extended overhead
steps: Lift shoulders and legs off ground simultaneously
Press lower back firmly into floor
Lower with control when time is up
mistakes: Allowing lower back to arch off floor
Lifting head too much and straining neck
safety: Start with bent knees if needed. Stop if lower back comes off the floor or if neck strains.

prescriptionHints.notes: Focus on back pressed to floor and steady breathing

joints.notes: Keep lower back pressed to floor. Modify if neck strain occurs.
